ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: Velks is good. I don t like going up high there. I made it to 51 and 52 in Velks. But lately it s been too crowded and I haven t been able to find a group. Im
ygData.messageBody:
Velks is good. I don't like going up high there. I made it to 51 and 52 in
Velks. But lately it's been too crowded and I haven't been able to find a
group.
Im not familiar with the tent. I do the floor where you come in either in
one of the side rooms or on the middle room in the back. I've sometimes gone
up to SH. I really hate going up those narrow passageways though. especially
with the slippery ice.
luv,
-Su

> Try also getting into a group in Velkator's(sp?) Labyrinth Prolly the
first
> floor or the pit there will be good at 52. I was in a group at the tent
> there with my then 50 SK but it was only cause the guy leading the group
> wanted me to level up higher and we had a 60 pally, 59 Cleric and 60
chanter
> in group. If you have Luclin then try getting a group in Maiden's Eye
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
>
>
> Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place to hunt
> to
> get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order.
> Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing the
other
> parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is
there..
> does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried that I
> will
> hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be banished to
> zone
> beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do the
> higher
> lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
> Any suggestions?
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
>
